Title: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC14050G...
Description: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC14050G-ST FEATURES Classic and elegant gold-tone 17 jewel mechanical polished finish double cover exhibition pocket watch perfect for engraving Both front and back covers open to expose elegant 17 jewel mechanical movement and it's moving parts Antique style black hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment plus solid brass desk top stand Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions DESCRIPTION This classic, elegant and sophisticated gold-tone exhibition pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased when the front and back covers are opened, highly polished engravable gold-tone case plus scratch resistant mineral crystals to protect your timepiece. Other features include bold blue cobalt hands, a 15 inch curb chain that can attach to your belt loop and a bonus solid brass desktop stand to display your timepiece proudly when not worn. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy.
